survey_brief: This survey aims to identify the professional development needs of employees to tailor training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: What is your current job role?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover all relevant job levels within the organization.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: What is your current job role?

questions.question_text: Which of the following skills would you like to develop further? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture additional skills not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following skills would you like to develop further? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to provide detailed feedback in their own words.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for this question.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in accessing professional development opportunities?

questions.question_text: How often would you prefer to attend professional development sessions?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'As needed' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How often would you prefer to attend professional development sessions?
